messages.subject: dogs at picnic
messages.msgSnippet: Hi everyone, I am planning on going to the picnic, not sure what food I will bring yet but will bring the kids:)) I have daughter 8 and sons 5 and  2. I wanted
messages.messageBody:
Hi everyone,

I am planning on going to the picnic, not sure what food I will bring
yet but will bring the kids:))
I have daughter 8 and sons 5 and 2.

I wanted to mention that while my sons love dogs, my daughter is VERY
afraid. (I am not sure why- cannot trace it back to any certain event
and dh and I are dog lovers as we had them as kids etc. We do have a
cat- so it is not all animals.) ANYWAY, I know it is a common childhood
fear and that we have run into other kids who are also afraid of dogs.
I wanted to mention it so that if you must bring your dog and if dogs
are allowed to be off leash- you will keep the leash on anyway- and
understand why my daughter will walk F A R A W A Y A R O U N D Y O
U A N D T H E D O G, but my sons will runrightintoyouandthedog and
I will be torn in two:)

Thanks for your consideration regarding this matter.
Susan Jones
